title: on me by section 128(2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) (as
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Retirement)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Retirement) 

(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited garda siochana (retirement) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2024

title: on me by section 128(2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) (as
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 3 September 2024.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 3 September 2024.

title: on me by section 128(2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) (as
heading: 3. Regulation 3 of the Garda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 1996 (S.I.
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3 of the Garda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 1996 (S.I. 

No. 16 of 1996) is amended by the substitution of “62” for “60”. 

The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

3 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 September, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [440] 3
